Question
========
Research results have revealed that intelligence in the Netherlands is normally distributed. The mean IQ score is 100, with a standard deviation of 15. Maaike has an IQ-score of 92.5. What percentage of people in the Netherlands will have a higher IQ score than Maaike?

Answerlist
----------
* 48.01%
* 69.15% 
* 30.85% 
* 51.99%
